Eric's place has a pond to the side of the house and a swing where you can sit and relax. I am not even a bird watcher but really liked looking at the colorful birds that hang around the property.
While you are out in the country, you are not out of civilization, Eric's place has all the modern conveniences and is really beautiful and full of great design and craftsmanship - I was impressed by his modern home. Also, I have stayed at other airbnbs where reviewers have written they were spotless, and haven't always agreed with other people's reviews. This place is truly spotless, so please respect this wonderful place if you stay there.
Finally, this airbnb is really close to an Amish community, so if like me you are interested in learning about Amish culture there is an Amish Welcome Center where you can learn more, or you can drive around and wherever you see a sign for fresh eggs, cheese, baked goods or custom furniture you can stop and buy something directly from the Amish families and get a glimpse into their very different way of life.
If I am ever in the area again I will stay here for sure. Eric was a kind and generous host and a really talented and interesting person to get to know.
